title: How to Make an Apple Strawberry Smoothie

steps.headline: Pour strawberries, sliced apples, lemon juice and milk into blender and blend on high.
steps.description: Check your smoothie using a spoon to make sure there are no lumps.

steps.headline: Add sugar and frozen yogurt into blender and blend.
steps.description: Using the frozen yogurt is important, as it helps supplement the sweetness of the fruit.

steps.headline: Add ice cubes and blend on high until the beverage is smooth.
Pour into a glass and enjoy!

text: Pour strawberries, sliced apples, lemon juice and milk into blender and blend on high. Check your smoothie using a spoon to make sure there are no lumps. Add sugar and frozen yogurt into blender and blend. Using the frozen yogurt is important, as it helps supplement the sweetness of the fruit. Add ice cubes and blend on high until the beverage is smooth.  Pour into a glass and enjoy!
